data.event: On April 3, 2007, San Benito celebrated the 100th anniversary of its naming.
The post office was named "Diaz" from April to May 1907.

event.title: opened in the same building Nov. 17, 2007

data.event: The San Benito Museum, Freddy Fender Museum and Conjunto Music Museum opened in the same building Nov. 17, 2007.

event.title: October 25, 1975, on the television show Hee Haw, Freddy Fender saluted

data.event: On October 25, 1975, on the television show Hee Haw, Freddy Fender saluted his hometown of San Benito, population 15,177.

event.title: the completion of the first irrigation system in 1906

data.event: The Anglo settlers came after the completion of the first irrigation system in 1906.
